Welcome to
Buy the Chowbaby Fast Food and Calories Guide
There are now 60 restaurants in the Chowbaby Fast Food and Calories Guide. We've added some more restaurants that are a step up from fast food, like On The Border, PF Changs, and Hometown Buffet.
PLEASE NOTE: The "TO GO" version of Chowbaby.com's Fast Food&Calories Guide is an abridged version (with 60 Restaurants Represented) of the Online guide (with 90 Restaurants Represented).
New Version Includes
192 Full-Color Pages 60 Popular Restaurants Nearly 3000 Menu Items Now Includes Trans Fat Convenient 4"x 9"Size NEW Easy-to-Read Format Get the New Edition hot off the press. CLICK HERE to purchase the"TO GO"version of Chowbaby.com's Fast Food&Calories Guide.
Chowbaby.com has listed nutritional and calories information from various fast food restaurants as a service to help you make smart choices. Items and serving sizes change often. Please check directly with the fast food restaurant if you have any questions. Chowbaby.com takes no responsibility for any inaccuracies that might occur. See how your favorite fast food restaurants measure up in calories with our Calorie Counter: Select the Restaurant: A&W Arby's Auntie Anne's Baja Fresh Baskin Robbins Ben&Jerry's Big Boy's Blimpie's Bob Evans Bojangle's Boston Market Bruegger's Burger King Captain D's Carl's Jr. Carvel Ice Cream Charley's Grilled Subs Chick-fil-A Chuck E.
